about_the_game:
A collection of B-Sides for the game Paradise_Killer. Featuring Fiona Lynch, Kyle Murray-Dickson, Fabian Hernandez, Ged Cartwright, Thomas Temple, MEEBEE and Okumura.

Written, produced and recorded by Barry "Epoch" Topping.

Leaving [Piano Arr.] arranged by Kyle Murray-Dickson and Barry Topping.
Additional vocal engineering by Ged Cartwright.
Lead vocals - Fiona Lynch.
Lyrics by Barry Topping
Saxophone - Fabian Hernandez.
Backing vocals - Ged Cartwright & Barry Topping.
Additional piano - Kyle Murray-Dickson.
Additional guitar - Thomas Temple.

Cover art by José Salot.
detailed_description:
A collection of B-Sides for the game Paradise_Killer. Featuring Fiona Lynch, Kyle Murray-Dickson, Fabian Hernandez, Ged Cartwright, Thomas Temple, MEEBEE and Okumura.

Written, produced and recorded by Barry "Epoch" Topping.

Leaving [Piano Arr.] arranged by Kyle Murray-Dickson and Barry Topping.
Additional vocal engineering by Ged Cartwright.
Lead vocals - Fiona Lynch.
Lyrics by Barry Topping
Saxophone - Fabian Hernandez.
Backing vocals - Ged Cartwright & Barry Topping.
Additional piano - Kyle Murray-Dickson.
Additional guitar - Thomas Temple.

Cover art by José Salot.
